   19: %%
   20: %%
   21: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %% Purpose: Verify the application specifics of the Megaco application
   23: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   24: -module(xmerl_app_test).
   25: 
   26: -compile(export_all).
   27: 
   28: %-include("megaco_test_lib.hrl").
   29: 
   30: 
   31: % t()     -> megaco_test_lib:t(?MODULE).
   32: % t(Case) -> megaco_test_lib:t({?MODULE, Case}).
   33: 
   34: 
   35: % %% Test server callbacks
   36: % init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   37: %     megaco_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Case, Config).
   38: 
   39: % end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   40: %     megaco_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Case, Config).
   41: 
   42: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   43: 
   44: all() -> 
   45:     [fields, modules, exportall, app_depend].
   46: 
   47: groups() -> 
   48:     [].
   49: 
   50: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   51:     Config.
   52: 
   53: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   54:     Config.
   55: 
   56: 
   57: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   58: 
   59: init_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   60:     case is_app(xmerl) of
   61: 	{ok, AppFile} ->
   62: 	    io:format("AppFile: ~n~p~n", [AppFile]),
   63: 	    [{app_file, AppFile}|Config];
   64: 	{error, Reason} ->
   65: 	    fail(Reason)
   66:     end.
   67: 
   68: is_app(App) ->
   69:     LibDir = code:lib_dir(App),
   70:     File = filename:join([LibDir, "ebin", atom_to_list(App) ++ ".app"]),
   71:     case file:consult(File) of
   72: 	{ok, [{application, App, AppFile}]} ->
   73: 	    {ok, AppFile};
   74: 	Error ->
   75: 	    {error, {invalid_format, Error}}
   76:     end.
   77: 
   78: 
   79: end_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   80:     Config.
   81: 
   82: 
   83: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   84: 
   85: fields(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   86:     AppFile = key1search(app_file, Config),
   87:     Fields = [vsn, description, modules, registered, applications],
   88:     case check_fields(Fields, AppFile, []) of
   89: 	[] ->
   90: 	    ok;
   91: 	Missing ->
   92: 	    fail({missing_fields, Missing})
   93:     end.
   94: 
   95: check_fields([], _AppFile, Missing) ->
   96:     Missing;
   97: check_fields([Field|Fields], AppFile, Missing) ->
   98:     check_fields(Fields, AppFile, check_field(Field, AppFile, Missing)).
   99: 
  100: check_field(Name, AppFile, Missing) ->
  101:     io:format("checking field: ~p~n", [Name]),
  102:     case lists:keymember(Name, 1, AppFile) of
  103: 	true ->
  104: 	    Missing;
  105: 	false ->
  106: 	    [Name|Missing]
  107:     end.
  108: 
  109: 
  110: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  111: 
  112: modules(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  113:     AppFile  = key1search(app_file, Config),
  114:     Mods     = key1search(modules, AppFile),
  115:     EbinList = get_ebin_mods(xmerl),
  116:     case missing_modules(Mods, EbinList, []) of
  117: 	[] ->
  118: 	    ok;
  119: 	Missing ->
  120: 	    throw({error, {missing_modules, Missing}})
  121:     end,
  122:     case extra_modules(Mods, EbinList, []) of
  123: 	[] ->
  124: 	    ok;
  125: 	Extra ->
  126: 	    throw({error, {extra_modules, Extra}})
  127:     end,
  128:     {ok, Mods}.
  129: 	    
  130: get_ebin_mods(App) ->
  131:     LibDir  = code:lib_dir(App),
  132:     EbinDir = filename:join([LibDir,"ebin"]),
  133:     {ok, Files0} = file:list_dir(EbinDir),
  134:     Files1 = [lists:reverse(File) || File <- Files0],
  135:     [list_to_atom(lists:reverse(Name)) || [$m,$a,$e,$b,$.|Name] <- Files1].
  136:     
  137: 
  138: missing_modules([], _Ebins, Missing) ->
  139:     Missing;
  140: missing_modules([Mod|Mods], Ebins, Missing) ->
  141:     case lists:member(Mod, Ebins) of
  142: 	true ->
  143: 	    missing_modules(Mods, Ebins, Missing);
  144: 	false ->
  145: 	    io:format("missing module: ~p~n", [Mod]),
  146: 	    missing_modules(Mods, Ebins, [Mod|Missing])
  147:     end.
  148: 
  149: 
  150: extra_modules(_Mods, [], Extra) ->
  151:     Extra;
  152: extra_modules(Mods, [Mod|Ebins], Extra) ->
  153:     case lists:member(Mod, Mods) of
  154: 	true ->
  155: 	    extra_modules(Mods, Ebins, Extra);
  156: 	false ->
  157: 	    io:format("supefluous module: ~p~n", [Mod]),
  158: 	    extra_modules(Mods, Ebins, [Mod|Extra])
  159:     end.
  160: 
  161: 
  162: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  163: 
  164: 
  165: exportall(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  166:     AppFile = key1search(app_file, Config),
  167:     Mods    = key1search(modules, AppFile),
  168:     check_export_all(Mods).
  169: 
  170: 
  171: check_export_all([]) ->
  172:     ok;
  173: check_export_all([Mod|Mods]) ->
  174:     case (catch apply(Mod, module_info, [compile])) of
  175: 	{'EXIT', {undef, _}} ->
  176: 	    check_export_all(Mods);
  177: 	O ->
  178:             case lists:keysearch(options, 1, O) of
  179:                 false ->
  180:                     check_export_all(Mods);
  181:                 {value, {options, List}} ->
  182:                     case lists:member(export_all, List) of
  183:                         true ->
  184: 			    throw({error, {export_all, Mod}});
  185: 			false ->
  186: 			    check_export_all(Mods)
  187:                     end
  188:             end
  189:     end.
  190: 
  191: 	    
  192: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  193: 
  194: app_depend(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  195:     AppFile = key1search(app_file, Config),
  196:     Apps    = key1search(applications, AppFile),
  197:     check_apps(Apps).
  198: 
  199: 
  200: check_apps([]) -> ok;
  201: check_apps([App|Apps]) ->
  202:     case is_app(App) of
  203: 	{ok, _} -> check_apps(Apps);
  204: 	Error -> throw({error, {missing_app, {App, Error}}})
  205:     end.
  206: 
  207: 
  208: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  209: 
  210: 
  211: fail(Reason) ->
  212:     exit({suite_failed, Reason}).
  213: 
  214: key1search(Key, L) ->
  215:     case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, L) of
  216: 	undefined ->
  217: 	    fail({not_found, Key, L});
  218: 	{value, {Key, Value}} ->
  219: 	    Value
  220:     end.
